description:
Add this Sonic the Hedgehog icon next to your username! 

Icons are pictures that display next to your Amigo's username during gameplay.

This icon is included in the Sonic the Hedgehog Costume & Accessories Pack.
Purchasing the Sonic the Hedgehog Costume & Accessories Pack will make this icon available for your Amigo in the shop menu.
name: Sonic the Hedgehog Icon
